directions: Place half of the cocktail rye bread on a clean work surface.  Spread each slice with cream cheese.
Place 1 or 2 slices of cucumber on each, and then 1 or 2 slices of onion.
Spread remaining slices with mayonnaise and place atop onions to complete the sandwiches.
ingredients: 1 large cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced
title: Party Cucumber Sandwiches
